title: About Me
intro: Hello! I'm CloudWide851. Welcome to my personal corner of the internet.
description: I am passionate about technology and software development. This website serves as a platform to showcase my work, share my learning journey, and experiment with new ideas.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.content: I started my coding journey exploring the basics of web development. Over time, I've dived deep into modern frameworks and tools, constantly learning and building. I believe in open source and the power of community-driven development.
